schemaDescription: Financial planning configuration parameters for retirement corpus calculation and investment allocation. Each parameter includes value, description, and constraints for building a comprehensive retirement planning model.

inflationRate.description: Expected annual inflation rate for adjusting future expenses and corpus requirements

retirementCorpus.description: Target retirement corpus required at the end of planning period

debtFundYield.description: Expected annual return from debt mutual funds

passiveMutualFundYield.description: Expected annual return from passive mutual funds (index funds/ETFs)

hybridMutualFundYield.description: Expected annual return from hybrid mutual funds (balanced funds)

planningHorizon.description: Total duration of the financial planning period until retirement

passiveMutualFunds.description: Percentage of total investment allocated to passive mutual funds

hybridMutualFunds.description: Percentage of total investment allocated to hybrid mutual funds

currentYear.description: Current annual expenses in the base year

growthRate.description: Annual growth rate of expenses (typically equals inflation rate)
